title: Authors and Citation
text: Sandro Burri. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Burri S (2025). dcatapchr: Create DCAT-AP CH Metadata Files. R package version 0.0.0.3.
code: @Manual{,   title = {dcatapchr: Create DCAT-AP CH Metadata Files},   author = {Sandro Burri},   year = {2025},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.3}, }

title: Create DCAT-AP CH Metadata Files
text: goal dcatapchr create metadata catalog compatible DCAT-AP CH standard. Basically, catalog consists one datasets, dataset one distributions (see https://www.dcat-ap.ch/releases/2.0/dcat-ap-ch.html https://handbook.opendata.swiss/de/content/glossar/bibliothek/dcat-ap-ch.html).

title: Create DCAT-AP CH Metadata Files
text: can install development version dcatapchr like : swissstatsr.r-universe.dev:

title: Create DCAT-AP CH Metadata Files
text: example , catalog created dataset 3 distributions. Export rdf file (UNIX line endings):
code: library(dcatapchr)  # Create the metadata of a dataset with 3 distributions  # First create the 3 distributions distributions <- c(   dcat_distribution(     issued = dct_issued("2021-10-14"),      access_url = dcat_accessURL(       "https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/cubo/cubi_POL_01_xlsx.zip"     ),      license = dct_license2(       "NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceRequired"     )   ),      dcat_distribution(     issued = dct_issued("2021-10-14"),      access_url = dcat_accessURL(       "https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/cubo/cubi_POL_01_px.zip"     ),      license = dct_license2(       "NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceRequired"     )   ),      dcat_distribution(     issued = dct_issued("2021-10-14"),      access_url = dcat_accessURL(       "https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/cubo/cubi_POL_01_csv.zip"     ),      licence = dct_license2(       "NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceRequired"     )   ) )  distributions #>  [1] "<dcat:distribution>"                                                                                         #>  [2] "  <dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                       #>  [3] "    <dct:issued rdf:datatype=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime\">2021-10-14T00:00:00</dct:issued>" #>  [4] "    <dcat:accessURL rdf:resource=\"https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/cubo/cubi_POL_01_xlsx.zip\" />"  #>  [5] "    <dct:license>NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceRequired</dct:license>"                     #>  [6] "  </dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                      #>  [7] "</dcat:distribution>"                                                                                        #>  [8] "<dcat:distribution>"                                                                                         #>  [9] "  <dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                       #> [10] "    <dct:issued rdf:datatype=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime\">2021-10-14T00:00:00</dct:issued>" #> [11] "    <dcat:accessURL rdf:resource=\"https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/cubo/cubi_POL_01_px.zip\" />"    #> [12] "    <dct:license>NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceRequired</dct:license>"                     #> [13] "  </dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                      #> [14] "</dcat:distribution>"                                                                                        #> [15] "<dcat:distribution>"                                                                                         #> [16] "  <dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                       #> [17] "    <dct:issued rdf:datatype=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime\">2021-10-14T00:00:00</dct:issued>" #> [18] "    <dcat:accessURL rdf:resource=\"https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/cubo/cubi_POL_01_csv.zip\" />"   #> [19] "    <dct:license>NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceNotRequired</dct:license>"                  #> [20] "    <dct:license>NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceRequired</dct:license>"                     #> [21] "  </dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                      #> [22] "</dcat:distribution>"  # Then create the dataset with the 3 distributions created above description <- readLines(   system.file(     "cubi_POL_01_INFORMAZIONI.txt", package = "dcatapchr"   ), encoding = "UTF-8" ) description <- strwrap(description, width = 80) description <- paste(description, collapse = "\n")  # Substitute & with & in urls description <- gsub("&", "&", description, fixed = TRUE)  dataset <- dcat_dataset(   title = dct_title(     title = "Partecipazione alle elezioni del Consiglio di Stato, per comune, in Ticino, dal 1921 al 2011",      language = "it"   ),    description = dct_description(     description = description,      language = "it"   ),    publisher = dct_publisher2(     publisher = "https://www.ti.ch/ustat",      foaf_name = "Ustat",     language = "it"   ),    contactPoint = dcat_contactPoint(),    identifier = dct_identifier(),   distribution = distributions )  # dataset  # And finally put the dataset in a catalog catalog <- dcat_catalog(   catalog_endpoint = "https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/digitale/catalogo_ustat.rdf",    datasets = dataset )  head(catalog, n = 15) #>  [1] "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>"                                                         #>  [2] "<rdf:RDF "                                                                                           #>  [3] "  xmlns:foaf=\"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/\""                                                         #>  [4] "  xmlns:rdfs=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#\""                                              #>  [5] "  xmlns:hydra=\"http://www.w3.org/ns/hydra/core#\""                                                  #>  [6] "  xmlns:rdf=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#\""                                         #>  [7] "  xmlns:dcat=\"http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#\""                                                         #>  [8] "  xmlns:dct=\"http://purl.org/dc/terms/\""                                                           #>  [9] "  xmlns:vcard=\"http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#\""                                                  #> [10] "  xmlns:xsd=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#\""                                                   #> [11] "  xmlns:schema=\"http://schema.org/\""                                                               #> [12] ">"                                                                                                   #> [13] "  <dcat:Catalog rdf:about=\"https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/digitale/catalogo_ustat.rdf\">" #> [14] "    <dcat:dataset>"                                                                                  #> [15] "      <dcat:Dataset>"   tail(catalog, n = 20) #>  [1] "        </dcat:distribution>"                                                                                        #>  [2] "        <dcat:distribution>"                                                                                         #>  [3] "          <dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                       #>  [4] "            <dct:issued rdf:datatype=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime\">2021-10-14T00:00:00</dct:issued>" #>  [5] "            <dcat:accessURL rdf:resource=\"https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/cubo/cubi_POL_01_px.zip\" />"    #>  [6] "            <dct:license>NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceRequired</dct:license>"                     #>  [7] "          </dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                      #>  [8] "        </dcat:distribution>"                                                                                        #>  [9] "        <dcat:distribution>"                                                                                         #> [10] "          <dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                       #> [11] "            <dct:issued rdf:datatype=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime\">2021-10-14T00:00:00</dct:issued>" #> [12] "            <dcat:accessURL rdf:resource=\"https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/cubo/cubi_POL_01_csv.zip\" />"   #> [13] "            <dct:license>NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceNotRequired</dct:license>"                  #> [14] "            <dct:license>NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceRequired</dct:license>"                     #> [15] "          </dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                      #> [16] "        </dcat:distribution>"                                                                                        #> [17] "      </dcat:Dataset>"                                                                                               #> [18] "    </dcat:dataset>"                                                                                                 #> [19] "  </dcat:Catalog>"                                                                                                   #> [20] "</rdf:RDF>" # f <- file("./catalogo_ustat.rdf", "wb") # writeLines(catalog, con = f, useBytes = TRUE) # close(f) write_unix(catalog, filename = "catalogo_ustat.rdf")

what: Adds quotes to a character string — add_quotes
title: Adds quotes to a character string — add_quotes
text: Adds quotes character string

title: Adds quotes to a character string — add_quotes
Adds quotes to a character string — add_quotes
text: x character string (vector)

title: Adds quotes to a character string — add_quotes
code: # Add quotes around a character string add_quotes("A character string") #> [1] "\"A character string\""  # Add quotes around a vector of strings add_quotes(c("a", "b")) #> [1] "\"a\"" "\"b\""

what: Create a DCAT-AP CH DataService (dcat:DataService) — dcat_DataService
title: Create a DCAT-AP CH DataService (dcat:DataService) — dcat_DataService
text: Create DCAT-AP CH DataService (dcat:DataService)

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH DataService (dcat:DataService) — dcat_DataService
Create a DCAT-AP CH DataService (dcat:DataService) — dcat_DataService
text: url DataService endpointURL enpointURL dataset, see dcat_endpointURL() ... property included dcat:Dataset

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH DataService (dcat:DataService) — dcat_DataService
text: character vector length greater one.

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH DataService (dcat:DataService) — dcat_DataService
text: dcat:DataService class, created dcat_DataService(), can/must following properties (M stands mandatory; R recommended): dcat:endpointURL, M V2: see dcat_endpointURL() dcat:contactPoint, M V2: see dcat_contactPoint() dct:publisher, M V2: see dct_publisher() dct:title, M V2: see dct_title() dct:endpointDescription, R V2: see dcat_endpointDescription() dct:license, R V2: see dct_license() /dct_license2() dcat:servesDataset, R V2: see dcat_servesDataset()

what: Create a dcat:accessService property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_accessService
title: Create a dcat:accessService property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_accessService
text: Create dcat:accessService property DCAT-AP CH standard

title: Create a dcat:accessService property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_accessService
Create a dcat:accessService property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_accessService
text: x things include dcat:accessService, typically one dcat:DataService

title: Create a dcat:accessURL property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_accessURL
Create a dcat:accessURL property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_accessURL
text: access_url url resource Mandatory property dcat:Distribution (dcat_distribution())

title: Create a dcat:accessURL property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_accessURL

title: Create a dcat:byteSize property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_byteSize
Create a dcat:byteSize property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_byteSize
text: size size resource (bytes) Property dcat:Distribution (dcat_distribution())

title: Create a dcat:byteSize property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_byteSize
code: # Size (in bytes) of a file f <- system.file("cubi_POL_01_INFORMAZIONI.txt", package = "dcatapchr") s <- file.size(f) s #> [1] 1614  # Create a dcat:byteSize tag dcat_byteSize(size = s) #> [1] "<dcat:byteSize rdf:datatype=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#integer\">1614</dcat:byteSize>"  # Remove f and s rm(f, s)

what: Create a DCAT-AP CH Catalog (dcat:Catalog) — dcat_catalog
title: Create a DCAT-AP CH Catalog (dcat:Catalog) — dcat_catalog
text: Create DCAT-AP CH Catalog (dcat:Catalog)

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH Catalog (dcat:Catalog) — dcat_catalog
Create a DCAT-AP CH Catalog (dcat:Catalog) — dcat_catalog
text: catalog_endpoint URL/URI catalog endpoint datasets character vector one dcat:dataset(s), see dcat_dataset() ... property included dcat:Catalog

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH Catalog (dcat:Catalog) — dcat_catalog
text: character vector length greater one, element line catalog rdf format. catalog can exported file unix file endings UTF-8 encoding write_unix().

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH Catalog (dcat:Catalog) — dcat_catalog
text: dcat:Catalog class, created dcat_catalog(), can/must following properties (M stands mandatory; R recommended): dcat:dataset, M V1, R V2: see dcat_dataset() dct:description, M V2: see dct_description() dct:publisher, M V2: see dct_publisher() dct:title, M V2: see dct_title() foaf:homepage, R V2: see foaf_homepage() dct:language, R V2: see dct_language() dct:license, R V2: see dct_license() dct:issued, R V2: see dct_issued() dct:rights, R V2: see dct_rights() dct:spatial, R V2: see dct_spatial() dcat:themeTaxonomy, R V2: see dcat_themeTaxonomy() dct:modified, R V2: see dct_modified() dcat:service, R V2: see dcat_service()

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH Catalog (dcat:Catalog) — dcat_catalog
code: dcat_catalog() #>  [1] "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>"                           #>  [2] "<rdf:RDF "                                                             #>  [3] "  xmlns:foaf=\"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/\""                           #>  [4] "  xmlns:rdfs=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#\""                #>  [5] "  xmlns:hydra=\"http://www.w3.org/ns/hydra/core#\""                    #>  [6] "  xmlns:rdf=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#\""           #>  [7] "  xmlns:dcat=\"http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#\""                           #>  [8] "  xmlns:dct=\"http://purl.org/dc/terms/\""                             #>  [9] "  xmlns:vcard=\"http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#\""                    #> [10] "  xmlns:xsd=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#\""                     #> [11] "  xmlns:schema=\"http://schema.org/\""                                 #> [12] ">"                                                                     #> [13] "  <dcat:Catalog rdf:about=\"https://swisstopo/catalog-endpoint.rdf\">" #> [14] "    <dcat:dataset rdf:resource=\"https://swisstopo/123\"/>"            #> [15] "  </dcat:Catalog>"                                                     #> [16] "</rdf:RDF>"                                                            dcat_catalog(catalog_endpoint = "") #>  [1] "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>"                 #>  [2] "<rdf:RDF "                                                   #>  [3] "  xmlns:foaf=\"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/\""                 #>  [4] "  xmlns:rdfs=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#\""      #>  [5] "  xmlns:hydra=\"http://www.w3.org/ns/hydra/core#\""          #>  [6] "  xmlns:rdf=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#\"" #>  [7] "  xmlns:dcat=\"http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#\""                 #>  [8] "  xmlns:dct=\"http://purl.org/dc/terms/\""                   #>  [9] "  xmlns:vcard=\"http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#\""          #> [10] "  xmlns:xsd=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#\""           #> [11] "  xmlns:schema=\"http://schema.org/\""                       #> [12] ">"                                                           #> [13] "  <dcat:Catalog>"                                            #> [14] "    <dcat:dataset rdf:resource=\"https://swisstopo/123\"/>"  #> [15] "  </dcat:Catalog>"                                           #> [16] "</rdf:RDF>"                                                    # Add some properties (...) dcat_catalog(   title = dct_title("Catalogo Ustat", language = "it"),   description = dct_description("Descrizione catalogo", language = "it") ) #>  [1] "<?xml version=\"1.0\" encoding=\"utf-8\" ?>"                                 #>  [2] "<rdf:RDF "                                                                   #>  [3] "  xmlns:foaf=\"http://xmlns.com/foaf/0.1/\""                                 #>  [4] "  xmlns:rdfs=\"http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#\""                      #>  [5] "  xmlns:hydra=\"http://www.w3.org/ns/hydra/core#\""                          #>  [6] "  xmlns:rdf=\"http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#\""                 #>  [7] "  xmlns:dcat=\"http://www.w3.org/ns/dcat#\""                                 #>  [8] "  xmlns:dct=\"http://purl.org/dc/terms/\""                                   #>  [9] "  xmlns:vcard=\"http://www.w3.org/2006/vcard/ns#\""                          #> [10] "  xmlns:xsd=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#\""                           #> [11] "  xmlns:schema=\"http://schema.org/\""                                       #> [12] ">"                                                                           #> [13] "  <dcat:Catalog rdf:about=\"https://swisstopo/catalog-endpoint.rdf\">"       #> [14] "    <dct:title xml:lang=\"it\">Catalogo Ustat</dct:title>"                   #> [15] "    <dct:description xml:lang=\"it\">Descrizione catalogo</dct:description>" #> [16] "    <dcat:dataset rdf:resource=\"https://swisstopo/123\"/>"                  #> [17] "  </dcat:Catalog>"                                                           #> [18] "</rdf:RDF>"

what: Create a dcat:contactPoint property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_contactPoint
title: Create a dcat:contactPoint property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_contactPoint
text: Create dcat:contactPoint property DCAT-AP CH standard

title: Create a dcat:contactPoint property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_contactPoint
code: dcat_contactPoint(   nodeID = paste(sample(letters), collapse = ""),   email = "dfe-ustat@ti.ch",   fn = "Ufficio di statistica del Canton Ticino (Ustat)" )

title: Create a dcat:contactPoint property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_contactPoint
text: nodeID organization id (character string) email email address fn name organization Mandatory property dcat:Dataset (dcat_dataset())

title: Create a dcat:contactPoint property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dcat_contactPoint
code: # Create a dcat:contactPoint tag dcat_contactPoint(   nodeID = "organization_id",   email = "dfe-ustat@ti.ch",   fn = "Ufficio di statistica del Canton Ticino (Ustat)" ) #> [1] "<dcat:contactPoint>"                                                      #> [2] "  <vcard:Organization rdf:nodeID=\"organization_id\">"                    #> [3] "    <vcard:hasEmail rdf:resource=\"mailto:dfe-ustat@ti.ch\"/>"            #> [4] "    <vcard:fn>Ufficio di statistica del Canton Ticino (Ustat)</vcard:fn>" #> [5] "  </vcard:Organization>"                                                  #> [6] "</dcat:contactPoint>"

what: Create a DCAT-AP CH Dataset (dcat:dataset) — dcat_dataset
title: Create a DCAT-AP CH Dataset (dcat:dataset) — dcat_dataset
text: dcat:dataset must one dcat:distribution(s).

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH Dataset (dcat:dataset) — dcat_dataset
code: dcat_dataset(   title = dct_title(),   description = dct_description(),   publisher = dct_publisher(),   contactPoint = dcat_contactPoint(),   identifier = dct_identifier(),   distribution = dcat_distribution(),   ... )

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH Dataset (dcat:dataset) — dcat_dataset
text: title title dataset, see dct_title(). Can multilingual. description description dataset, see dct_description(). Can multilingual. publisher publisher dataset, see dct_publisher(). contactPoint contactPoint dataset, see dcat_contactPoint(). identifier identifier dataset, see dct_identifier(). distribution one distributions, see dcat_distribution() ... property included dcat:Dataset

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH Dataset (dcat:dataset) — dcat_dataset
text: character vector length greater one.

title: Create a DCAT-AP CH Dataset (dcat:dataset) — dcat_dataset
text: dcat:Dataset class, created dcat_dataset(), can/must following properties (M stands mandatory; R recommended): dcat:contactPoint, M V1 V2: see dcat_contactPoint() dct:description, M V1 V2: see dct_description() dct:identifier, M V1 V2: see dct_identifier() dct:publisher, M V1 V2: see dct_publisher() dct:title, M V1 V2: see dct_title() dcat:distribution, M V1, R V2: see dcat_distribution() dcat:keyword, R V2: see dcat_keyword() dcat:landingPage, R V2: see dcat_landingPage() dct:issued, R V2: see dct_issued() dct:spatial, R V2: see dct_spatial() dct:temporal, R V2: see dct_temporal() dcat:theme, R V2: see dcat_theme() dct:modified, R V2: see dct_modified()

title: Create a dcat:distribution/dcat:Distribution property — dcat_distribution
text: Create dcat:distribution/dcat:Distribution property

title: Create a dcat:distribution/dcat:Distribution property — dcat_distribution
code: dcat_distribution(   issued = dct_issued(),   access_url = dcat_accessURL(),   license = dct_license2(),   ... )

title: Create a dcat:distribution/dcat:Distribution property — dcat_distribution
text: issued dct:issued property, see dct_issued(). access_url dcat:accessURL property, see dcat_accessURL(). license dct:license property, see dct_license(). ... property included dcat:Distribution

title: Create a dcat:distribution/dcat:Distribution property — dcat_distribution
text: character vector length greater one.

title: Create a dcat:distribution/dcat:Distribution property — dcat_distribution
text: dcat:Dataset class, created dcat_dataset(), can/must following properties (M stands mandatory; R recommended): dct:issued, M V1, R V2: see dct_issued() dcat:accessURL, M V1 V2: see dcat_accessURL() dct:license, M V1 V2: see dct_license() dcatap:availability, R V2: yet implemented dct:description, R V1 V2: see dct_description() dct:format, R V2: see dct_format() dct:rights, R V2: see dct_rights() dct:title, M V1, R V2: see dct_title() dct:modified, R V2: see dct_modified() dcat:accessService, R V2: see dcat_accessService()

title: Create a dcat:distribution/dcat:Distribution property — dcat_distribution
code: dcat_distribution() #> [1] "<dcat:distribution>"                                                                                         #> [2] "  <dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                       #> [3] "    <dct:issued rdf:datatype=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime\">2025-06-12T00:00:00</dct:issued>" #> [4] "    <dcat:accessURL rdf:resource=\"https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/cubo/cubi_POL_01_csv.zip\" />"   #> [5] "    <dct:license>NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceNotRequired</dct:license>"                  #> [6] "  </dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                      #> [7] "</dcat:distribution>"                                                                                         dcat_distribution(description = dct_description("Un archivio zip con un csv")) #> [1] "<dcat:distribution>"                                                                                         #> [2] "  <dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                       #> [3] "    <dct:issued rdf:datatype=\"http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#dateTime\">2025-06-12T00:00:00</dct:issued>" #> [4] "    <dcat:accessURL rdf:resource=\"https://www3.ti.ch/DFE/DR/USTAT/allegati/cubo/cubi_POL_01_csv.zip\" />"   #> [5] "    <dct:license>NonCommercialAllowed-CommercialAllowed-ReferenceNotRequired</dct:license>"                  #> [6] "    <dct:description xml:lang=\"it\">Un archivio zip con un csv</dct:description>"                           #> [7] "  </dcat:Distribution>"                                                                                      #> [8] "</dcat:distribution>"

text: dct_publisher() modeled foaf:Organization, dct_publisher2() modelled foaf:Agent accordance DCAT-AP CH v2. dct_publisher2() allows specification foaf:name languages.

title: Create a dct:publisher property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dct_publisher
code: dct_publisher(   publisher = "https://www.ti.ch/ustat",   foaf_name = "Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)" )  dct_publisher2(   publisher = "https://www.ti.ch/ustat",   foaf_name = "Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)",   language = "it" )

title: Create a dct:publisher property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dct_publisher
text: publisher character string publisher (usually URL) foaf_name name organization/publisher language language foaf:name. Can one "de", "fr", "" "en". Must length foaf_name.

title: Create a dct:publisher property in DCAT-AP CH standard — dct_publisher
code: dct_publisher(   publisher = "https://www.ti.ch/ustat",   foaf_name = "Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)" ) #> [1] "<dct:publisher>"                                                             #> [2] "  <foaf:Organization rdf:about=\"https://www.ti.ch/ustat\">"                 #> [3] "    <foaf:name>Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)</foaf:name>" #> [4] "  </foaf:Organization>"                                                      #> [5] "</dct:publisher>"                                                             dct_publisher2(   publisher = "https://www.ti.ch/ustat",   foaf_name = "Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)",   language = "it" ) #> [1] "<dct:publisher>"                                                                             #> [2] "  <foaf:Agent rdf:about=\"https://www.ti.ch/ustat\">"                                        #> [3] "    <foaf:name xml:lang=\"it\">Ufficio di statistica del Cantone Ticino (Ustat)</foaf:name>" #> [4] "  </foaf:Agent>"                                                                             #> [5] "</dct:publisher>"
